00001 #########################################################################
00002 #
00003 #  Use this for undefined operators in the Context operator list.
00004 #  They will still be recognized by the parser (so you don't get
00005 #  'unexpected character' errors), but get a message that the operation
00006 #  is not defined in this context.
00007 #
00008 
00009 package Parser::BOP::undefined;
00010 use strict;
00011 our @ISA = qw(Parser::BOP);
00012 
00013 sub _check {
00014   my $self = shift;
00015   my $bop = $self->{def}{string} || $self->{bop};
00016   $self->Error("Can't use '%s' in this context",$bop);
00017 }
00018 
00019 #########################################################################
00020 
00021 1;
